entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
